comment: Posting on chan has grinded to a near halt, as users are reporting significant failures in posts going through. There is speculation whether this is due to a simple DDOS attack, or a more sinister MITM attack. The fog of war is real. It seems somebody is trying everything they can to disrupt the flow of ideas and memes ahead of the November Midterm Elections.
amr:
# ::snt Posting on chan has grinded to a near halt, as users are reporting significant failures in posts going through. There is speculation whether this is due to a simple DDOS attack, or a more sinister MITM attack. The fog of war is real. It seems somebody is trying everything they can to disrupt the flow of ideas and memes ahead of the November Midterm Elections.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / grind-01
            :ARG1 (p / post-01
                  :medium (p2 / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Chan")))
            :ARG2 (h / halt-01
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG1-of (n2 / near-02))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (r / report-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / person
                              :ARG0-of (u / use-01))
                        :ARG1 (f / fail-01
                              :ARG1 p3
                              :ARG1-of (s / significant-02)
                              :location (p4 / post-01
                                    :ARG1-of (g2 / go-through-20))))))
      :snt2 (s2 / speculate-01
            :ARG1 (t / truth-value
                  :polarity-of c
                  :ARG0 (o / or
                        :op1 (a / attack-01
                              :ARG1 (p5 / product
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "DDOS"))
                              :ARG1-of (s3 / simple-02))
                        :op2 (a2 / attack-01
                              :ARG1 (o2 / organization
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "MITM"))
                              :ARG1-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG2 (s4 / sinister)
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / more))))))
      :snt3 (r2 / real-04
            :ARG1 (f2 / fog
                  :mod (w / war-01)))
      :snt4 (s5 / seem-01
            :ARG1 (t2 / try-01
                  :ARG0 (s6 / somebody)
                  :ARG1 (e / everything
                        :ARG1-of (p6 / possible-01))
                  :purpose (d / disrupt-01
                        :ARG0 s6
                        :ARG1 (f3 / flow-01
                              :ARG1 (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (ii / idea)
                                    :op2 (m3 / meme)))
                        :time (a4 / ahead
                              :op1 (e2 / elect-01
                                    :time (d2 / date-entity
                                          :month 11)
                                    :mod (m4 / midterm)))))))

comment: Hi There, please refrain from using derogatory comments in the thread. They are hurtful and unwanted. If you continue Admin will be alerted
amr:
# ::snt Hi There, please refrain from using derogatory comments in the thread. They are hurtful and unwanted. If you continue Admin will be alerted
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "There")))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                        :mod (d / derogatory))
                  :location (t / thread)))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (h2 / hurtful)
            :op2 (w / want-01
                  :polarity -)
            :domain (t2 / they))
      :snt4 (a2 / alert-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (a3 / administrate-01))
            :condition (c2 / continue-01
                  :ARG0 y)))

comment: Please let us avoid using offensive words and keep the discussion more calm and civil and not chaotic, thank you.
amr:
# ::snt Please let us avoid using offensive words and keep the discussion more calm and civil and not chaotic, thank you.
(l / let-01
      :polite +
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / avoid-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (w2 / word
                              :ARG1-of (o / offend-01))))
            :op2 (k / keep-02
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (d / discuss-01
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (c / calm-03
                                          :ARG1 d)
                                    :op2 (c2 / civil
                                          :domain d))
                              :ARG3 (m / more))
                        :ARG1-of (c3 / contrast-01
                              :ARG2 (c4 / chaos
                                    :polarity -
                                    :domain d)))))
      :ARG2-of (t / thank-01
            :ARG1 y))

comment: Please use more tender words that are not so condescending.
amr:
# ::snt Please use more tender words that are not so condescending.
(u / use-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (w / word
            :ARG0-of (c / condescend-01
                  :degree (s / so
                        :polarity -))
            :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (t / tender-02
                        :ARG1 w)
                  :ARG3 (m / more))))
